title: Centered Spirit | Shop
description: Welcome to Centered Spirit's & Emilie's French Teas Shop. Our Shop focuses on Health & Wellness Products including, teas, tisanes, herbs and tinctures.
cleaned_text: HOME ABOUT SERVICES PRACTITIONERS COMMUNITY AIH INSTITUTE CONTACT More Welcome to Centered Spirit's Shop. We offer natural remedies for health and wellness, with herbal remedies including tinctures, teas, herbs, salves coming from local producers as well as France and Mexico.
